document.text:
From: 
To: 
Subject: Call notes w/ 
re 
cellmate policy 
Date: Sun, 11 Aug 2019 16:30:59 +0000 
According to Lt. who spoke with Lt. transferred the call to the warden 
asked if he was required to have a cellmate: 
o  Discretionary matter; 
o  Epstein was supposed to have a cellmate at all time per the warden. 
o  When his cellmate was released, Epstein was in the attorney visiting area. 
o  As a general practice, prior to the shift, the officers are briefed. The people in the SHU were supposed to 
be briefed down that Epstein was supposed to have a cellmate at all time. Officers have the authority to 
move cellmates. Captain was supposed to brief the Lt. who is supposed to brief down to the officers. 
Don't yet know whether the captain briefed the officers. 
We asked for follow-up materials relating the cellmate policy and whether this direction was committed to 
writing. 
Assistant United States Attorney 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York 
One St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, New York 10007 
Tel 
EFTA00019341
